comments:
Used Eclipse 3.1 M5 + cdt 3.0 I200503140300 build

Steps to reproduce:
-----------------------
1. create a c/C++ standard make or managed make project
2. Select the indexer in C/C++ Indexer tab when you create the project.
3. Once the project is created, go to properties, select C/C++ indexer, click 
on "OK", an error message will pop up and NPE will be generated. 

********** attached NPE ***************
